mobiles.name: goblin slave
mobiles.long_description: A goblin slave lies here asleep.
mobiles.description: The defenseless goblin begs for mercy.

mobiles.name: drow commoner
mobiles.long_description: A drow commoner walks on guard duty.
mobiles.description: I doubt he is the type to give directions.

mobiles.name: drow noble warrior
mobiles.long_description: The drow warrior noble stands here guarding his home.

mobiles.name: drow noble mage
mobiles.long_description: The drow mage noble is here protecting his home.
mobiles.description: The mage prepares to cast a spell ... at you!!

mobiles.name: drow priestess
mobiles.long_description: The drow priestess is here shouting orders.
mobiles.description: I wouldn't want go get on her bad side!

mobiles.name: drow master
mobiles.long_description: The drow master stares at you angrily.
mobiles.description: The drow master is ALWAYS ready for a fight.

mobiles.name: drow weapons master
mobiles.long_description: The drow weapons master is here shadow boxing.
mobiles.description: He definitely knows his way around in combat.

mobiles.name: drow matron mother
mobiles.long_description: The matron mother of the house is standing here.

mobiles.name: drow matron mother
mobiles.long_description: The matron mother of the 1st house is waiting for you.
mobiles.description: She looks like she is about to rip your head off and eat it.

mobiles.name: yochlol
mobiles.long_description: A yochlol forms out of a swirling mist.
mobiles.description: The yochlol is not in a good mood.

mobiles.name: drow guard
mobiles.long_description: The drow guard is here staring at you ominously.
mobiles.description: The drow guard blends so well with his environment, you barely see his form.

mobiles.name: drow scout
mobiles.long_description: The drow scout is here sneaking among the shadows.
mobiles.description: The drow scout blends so well with her environment, you barely see her form.

objects.name: longsword commoner
objects.description: A commoner's longsword made of adamantite has been left here.

objects.name: longsword noble
objects.description: A drow noble's longsword made of adamantite lies here.

objects.name: whip snake two-headed
objects.description: A whip with two snakes heads lies here.

objects.name: whip snake three-headed
objects.description: A whip with three snake heads has been left here.

objects.name: whip snake four-headed
objects.description: A whip with four snake heads has been left here.

objects.name: longsword black
objects.description: A black longsword has been carelessly left here.

objects.name: whip snake five-headed
objects.description: A whip with five snake heads is lying here.

objects.name: whip snake six-headed
objects.description: A whip with six snake heads has been dropped here.

objects.name: bracers iron
objects.description: A pair of bracers has been dropped here.

objects.name: gauntlets iron
objects.description: A pair of gauntlets has been dropped here.

objects.name: wand blue silver
objects.description: A silvery blue wand has been dropped in the dirt.

objects.name: helmet helm
objects.description: A small helmet lies up against a rock.

objects.name: ring ruby
objects.description: A small ruby ring lies in the dirt.

objects.name: dagger sacrificial
objects.description: A dagger with spider leg shaped blades lies on the ground.

objects.name: hat green
objects.description: A small bright green hat lies in the dirt.

rooms.name: Mage's Academy
rooms.description:
The mages academy is fairly well decorated see that the drow prefer magic
over physical power greatly.

rooms.name: City street
rooms.description:
You walk along a highly ornate city street going eastward. To the north is
a building.

rooms.name: Slave Chamber
rooms.description:
The room is in shambles. Straw is strewn all about the room as beds for the
unfortunate creatures who have fallen prey to drow imperialism.

rooms.name: City street
rooms.description:
You walk along a highly ornate city street leading west and south. To the
north is a relatively small house.

rooms.name: 4th house
rooms.description:
You stand inside the 4th house of the city. Its inner courtyard is rather
dull by drow standards and rather small as well.

rooms.name: Throne Room
rooms.description:
The throne room is basically similar to the inner courtyard in regards
to decor. there is a small throne behind the altar but that is about it.

rooms.name: Entrance Way
rooms.description:
You stand in the entrance way to the temple which opens up to the north
into a large hallway going east and west. Small statues of spiders line the
entrance way's walls.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description:
You are in a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved
with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west. As you
look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving away from you.
To the north is a obsidian stairway.

rooms.name: Long Hallway
rooms.description:
You are in a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved
with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west. As you
look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving away from you.

rooms.name: Long Hallway
rooms.description:
You are in a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved
with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west. As you
look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving away from you.
To the north is a door.

rooms.name: Long Hallway
rooms.description:
You are in a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved
with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west. As you
look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving away from you.

rooms.name: Long Hallway
rooms.description:
You are in a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved
with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west. As you
look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving away from you.

rooms.name: Long Hallway
rooms.description:
You are in a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved
with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west. As you
look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving away from you.
To the south is a door.

rooms.name: Warrior's Barracks
rooms.description:
The room is a complete mess. None of the beds are made, clothes and other
items have been left all about the room. Well drow warriors never were known
for neatness.

rooms.name: Long Hallway
rooms.description:
You are in a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved
with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west. As you
look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving away from you.

rooms.name: Grand Stairway
rooms.description:
You are standing at the bottom of a giant obsidian and adamantite
stairway. The edges are trimmed with gold.

rooms.name: Grand Hallway
rooms.description:
You are standing in the middle of a grand hallway. The walls are
of the purest adamantite with gold trim. Mosaics line the walls.

rooms.name: Mage's Barracks
rooms.description:
The mage's living quarters is rather clean with the exception of a few
used component containers. It is rather well decorated as well. Cots line the
floor for the mages to sleep on. the only door is to the west.

rooms.name: Grand Hallway
rooms.description:
You are walking down a grand hallway, heavily decorated with adamantite
and gold. To the north the hall goes down a flight of stairs while a door is
too the west.

rooms.name: Cleric's Barracks
rooms.description:
The bed chamber is brightly decorated with spider shaped statues, murals
and the like. Large beds line the floor making this a comfortable room to live
in.

rooms.name: Grand Stairway
rooms.description:
You are climbing a set of obsidian stairs surrounded by adamantite walls.
To the north are a set of large golden doors.

rooms.name: Main Chamber
rooms.description:
This is the south side of a large auditorium used for services by the
drow priestesses. In the center is a large sacrificial pit and beyond that is
an altar.

rooms.name: Eastern side of Chamber
rooms.description:
You are on the eastern side of the chamber overlooking the pit. To the east
is a door while to the north is an altar.

rooms.name: Sacrificial Pit
rooms.description:
A you climb down into the pit thousands of spiders cover you tearing your
body to shreds.

Lloth thanks you for your sacrifice.

You've fallen, and you can't get up!!!

rooms.name: Western side of Chamber
rooms.description:
You are on the western side of the main chamber overlooking a sacrificial
pit. To the north is an altar.

rooms.name: The Altar
rooms.description:
You are standing in front of a highly and freshly bloodstained altar.
Engraved on the top of the altar is a giant spider with a human head. Looking
down from the altar you see a large sacrificial pit.

rooms.name: Slave Cells
rooms.description:
This is the main room to the cell chambers for the slaves to be
sacrificed. You notice there are no guards around.

rooms.name: Slave Pen
rooms.description:
Rotten meat and breads lie about the floor while shackles hang from the
walls. The room wreaks of death. You almost become nauseous and decide to leave
the room since you were obviously too late to save the slave.

rooms.name: Dais
rooms.description:
You stand upon a dais behind the altar. Above you is a enormous illusion
of a female drow turning into a giant spider and back again. There is a door
to the west.

rooms.name: The Treasury
rooms.description:
This is obviously only a temporary storage place for the collected
treasure being rather bare.

rooms.name: Weaponsmaster's Chamber
rooms.description:
This one person bedchamber is very elegant. The owner must be held in high
to get this kind of treatment.

rooms.name: Archway of Ascension
rooms.description:
Entrance to the Nosferatu haven, an ancient stone
archway is erected here.  Upon this timeless
architecture is a prophecy scribed in a lost tongue
known only to the clan and those they chose to know. 
It reads:

                     Darkness shall reign eternal,
                     And it will know only one name
 
                               Nosferatu

rooms.name: Library of the Damned
rooms.description:
As you enter the library, your jaw drops as you scan
the immense collection of books before you.  A single
iron staircase spirals downward allowing access to the
countless levels of this room.  You brows the books
within your reach and you discover literature thought
to be lost for centuries.  You grin with a new
knowledge as your realize this wisdom was never lost.

rooms.name: An Eerie Corridor
rooms.description:
A long seemingly endless hallway extends into the
darkness ahead of you.  As you walk along this dimly
lit passage, you begin to hear faint cries and screams
echoing from a distance.  You pause and listen closely
but there is only silence.  You hasten your pace
hoping it really was just your imagination.

rooms.name: Nosferatu Conclave House
rooms.description:
Over the ages, the several rings of onyx benches
within this room have housed the Nosferatu conclaves. 
Here clan members gather to discuss issues of
importance involving the fate of the clan, kindred,
and kind alike.

rooms.name: Alcove of Scribes
rooms.description:
Just south of the library, this room is where
Nosferatu come to write of the knowledge they have
gained.  near the entrance are stacks of blank
journals and a variety of pens readily available for
use.  Beyond this point are several private booths
lined along the walls to allow members a thoughtful
and productive atmosphere.

rooms.name: Chasm of Regret
rooms.description:
Here at the heart of the Nosferatu haven lies a great
chasm descending far into the depths of this world. 
Believed by some to be a gateway to hell, only those
foolish to have earned the clan’s wraith know what
pain and torment await within it.  Alas, they will
never return to tell of this.

rooms.name: Chamber of Sleeping Wisdom
rooms.description:
A cool mist fills the air of this dark quiet tomb. 
While the sun rules the sky, the clan princes and a
number of members come here to rest and regenerate.

rooms.name: Hall of the Neonate
rooms.description:
Young Nosferatu are here busily learning the ways of
the clan.  Some are enhancing their fighting skills
while others listen tentatively to a clan elder as he
speaks of ancient days.  While clan members spend at
least their first 100 years visiting this hall, all
members return here often to revitalize their
learnings.

rooms.name: An Eerie Corridor
rooms.description:
A long seemingly endless hallway extends into the
darkness ahead of you.  As you walk along this dimly
lit passage, you begin to hear faint cries and screams
echoing from a distance.  You pause and listen closely
but there is only silence.  You hasten your pace
hoping it really was just your imagination.

rooms.name: Garden of Sorrow
rooms.description:
Somewhat out of place within the darkness of the
Nosferatu haven, a beautiful and brilliant garden of
rare flora has been maintained here throughout the
centuries.  Here clan members come to remember their
beloved brethren who have passed on to the eternal
sleep.

rooms.name: The Vault
rooms.description:
Seek and you shall find all things imaginable here
within the walls of the Nosferatu vault.  With the
acquisition of knowledge come the gains of the
material world.  Legendary weapons, forgotten art, and
a vast assortment of other artifacts have been stored
here over the centuries.

rooms.name: City Entrance
rooms.description:
You are at the entrance to a small underground city. A great adamantite
gate lies open to the west allowing entrance into the city.

exits.description: A huge gate opens to the west allowing entrance into the city.
A small hole in the ceiling leads up into darkness.

extra_descr_data.description: A small hole that looks to have sealed at one time.
A large adamantite gate with giant spider shaped emblems stands here.

rooms.name: City street
rooms.description:
You walk along a highly ornate street going north-south. A large gate
lies to the east while a building lies to the west.

rooms.name: City street
rooms.description: You walk along a highly ornate city street going north and west.

rooms.name: City street
rooms.description:
You walk along a highly ornate city street going east-west. A large house
stands to the south.

rooms.name: 3rd House
rooms.description:
You stand inside the 3rd house of the city; it is fairly well decorated
by drow standards having a few statues, murals and such. A door leads to the
south.

rooms.name: Throne Room
rooms.description:
The throne room of the 3rd house is about as decorated as the inner
courtyard except with a blood covered altar in the center of the room.

rooms.name: City street
rooms.description:
You walk along a highly ornate city street going east-west. To the north
is a large building.

rooms.name: City street
rooms.description:
You walk along a highly ornate city street leading north and east. To the
south is an extremely large house.

rooms.name: 2nd House
rooms.description:
You stand inside the 2nd house of the city. The room is highly decorated
with statues of spiders and murals everywhere.

rooms.name: Throne Room
rooms.description:
The throne room of the 2nd house is just a little more decorative than
the inner courtyard having an altar in the center of the room.

rooms.name: Main Gate
rooms.description:
You are at the entrance to the 1st house of the city. A large gate, almost
as big and elegant as the one at the entrance to the city, stands here.

exits.description: A large gate lies to the west.

rooms.name: 1st House
rooms.description:
You stand in the inner courtyard of the 1st and largest house in the city.
The room is extremely large and decorative. Mural and paintings hang on the
walls depicting some battles and a spider queen.

rooms.name: Throne Room
rooms.description:
The throne room of the 1st house is in one word...awesome. It is so
horrifying it is almost beautiful.
Barely noticeable, is the symbol for clan Nosferatu, carved into the throne.

roomtext_data.output:
$n sits on the throne, which sinks into the floor,
and then rises again, but $n has vanished !
roomtext_data.name: all

rooms.name: Main Chamber
rooms.description:
This is the council chamber for the Matron Mother herself. A huge table
and chairs surrounding it sits in the center of the room.

rooms.name: City street
rooms.description: You walk along a highly ornate city street leading north-south and east.

rooms.name: City street
rooms.description:
You walk along a highly ornate city street leading south. A building is
to the west.

rooms.name: Cleric Academy
rooms.description: This is the most lavish of the academies being that it is for the clerics.

rooms.name: City street
rooms.description:
You walk along a highly ornate city street going east-west. To the north
is a giant temple.

exits.description: The entrance to the temple of Lloth.

rooms.name: Warrior's Academy
rooms.description: This looks more like a barracks than a school.

rooms.name: Entrance to the Temple of Lloth
rooms.description:
The temple is the largest building in the city. Even it's doors are beyond
imagination. Inside of the temple entrance, the walls are made of gold and
adamantite.
